title: Job ingestion: add command
description: hunt add <url_or_text> - Parse job posting, extract employer, title, pay range if present. Store in jobs table. Create employer if new.

title: Private company ownership research
description: For privately held employers: research parent company, PE/VC ownership, key investors. Surface potential concerns (e.g., owned by controversial entities).

title: Public company 'evil report'
description: For publicly traded employers: research controversies, labor practices, environmental issues, political donations. Compile a 'how evil are they?' summary with sources.

title: SQLite schema and migrations
description: Create SQLite database with rusqlite. Tables: employers (id, name, domain, status [ok/yuck/never], notes), jobs (id, employer_id, title, url, source, status, pay_min, pay_max, raw_text, created_at), job_snapshots (id, job_id, raw_text, captured_at)

title: Employer management: block/yuck commands
description: hunt employer list - Show all employers with status. hunt employer block <name> - Mark as never. hunt employer yuck <name> - Mark as yuck. hunt employer ok <name> - Clear status.

title: Resume tailoring
description: Generate tailored resume variants per job. Emphasize relevant skills/experience. Store variants linked to jobs. Support multiple base resume formats.

title: Email alert parsing
description: Parse forwarded job alert emails from LinkedIn and Indeed. Extract job listings and ingest automatically. Likely needs IMAP or local mbox parsing.

title: Glassdoor tracking
description: For watched employers, track recent Glassdoor reviews. Alert on new reviews. Summarize sentiment trends. Store review snapshots.

title: Job listing and detail view
description: hunt list - Show jobs with status, employer, title, pay range. Filterable by status. hunt show <id> - Full job details including raw text and snapshots.

title: Future: Company intelligence features
description: Advanced employer research: Glassdoor tracking, startup research (Crunchbase/YC/HN), public company 'evil reports', private company ownership research

title: CLI scaffold with clap
description: Set up clap-based CLI with subcommands: init, add, list, show, employer, rank. Basic argument parsing structure.

title: MVP: Core CLI + SQLite foundation
description: Basic CLI structure with clap, SQLite database with rusqlite, and core data model (employers, jobs, job_snapshots tables)
close_reason: MVP achieved: CLI, SQLite, add/list/show/rank/employer commands all working

title: Basic job ranking
description: hunt rank - Score and sort jobs. Initial scoring: pay range, employer status (penalize yuck), recency. Output ranked list with scores.

title: Startup research: Crunchbase/YC/HN
description: For startup employers: pull and summarize funding info from Crunchbase, YC batch info, HN mentions/discussions. Flag recent funding rounds or layoffs.
